name: Super Action Man
description:
(Made in 72 hours as part of Ludum Dare 31 "Entire game on one screen")

Coming soon to a theater near you - Super Action Man! Follow the epic story of Sam as he battles the forces of evil on a motorcycle, battles the forces of evil on a train, battles the forces of evil on a building, and has a conversation with his girlfriend. Featuring voice acting by legendary actors such as some-guy-that-kind-of-sounds-like-Schwarzenegger and the-generic-villain-guy. Be sure to buy your ticket now - they won't be around for long!

Controls: Arrow Keys and Space for all levels

Gameplay:
Level 1: Shoot cars to destroy them. Each one will take 2 hits. After defeating enough you can move on.
Level 2: Make a dramatic choice at the end of the conversation, ultimately affecting the plot in absolutely no way!
Level 3: Duck underneath the quick moving obstacles and bullets. While ducking you can't shoot. Kill both enemies to move on. Note: Colliding bullets destroy each other.
Level 4: Hit the lit up arrow keys before the timer runs out! But be careful not to wait too long or hit the wrong ones!
